name: Secure Objective 1
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 1 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 2
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 2 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 3
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 3 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 4
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 4 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 5
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 5 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 6
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 6 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 1
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 1 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 2
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 2 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 3
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 3 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 4
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 4 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 5
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 5 at the end of your turn.

name: Secure Objective 6
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you control Objective Marker 6 at the end of your turn.

name: Recon
descrip: If the mission has the Mysterious Objectives mission special rule, score 1 Victory Point if every objective on the battlefield has been identified at the end of this, or any previous turn.

name: Behind Enemy Lines
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if one of your scoring units is within 12" of your opponent's table edge at the end of your turn. If 3 or more of your scoring units are within 12" of your opponent's table edge at the end of your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Hold the Line
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if at least 3 of your scoring units and none of your opponents scoring units are within 12" of your own table edge at the end of your turn.

name: Ascendency
descrip: Score D3 Victory Points if you control any 3 Objective Markers at the end of your turn.

name: Supremacy
descrip: Score D3 Victory Points if you control at least two Objective Markers and at least twice as many Objective Markers as your opponent controls at the end of your turn.

name: Domination
descrip: Score D3+3 Victory Points if you control every Objective Marker on the table at the end of your turn.

name: Overwhelming Firepower
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if an enemy unit was completely destroyed during the Shooting phase of your turn. If you completely destroyed 3 or more enemy units during the Shooting phase of your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Blood and Guts
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if an enemy unit was completely destroyed during the Assault phase of your turn. If you completely destroyed 3 or more enemy units during the Assault phase of your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: No Prisoners
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if an enemy unit was completely destroyed during your turn. If you completely destroyed between 3 and 5 enemy units during your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead. If you destroyed 6 or more enemy units during your turn, score d3+3 Victory Points instead.

name: Hungry For Glory
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you issued a challenge during your turn. If you issued 3 or more challenges during your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Psychological Warfare
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if your opponent failed a Morale, Pinning or Fear test during this turn. If your opponent failed 3 or more Morale, Pinning or Fear tests, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Harness the Warp
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point if you successfully manifested a Psychic Power during your turn. If you successfully manifested 3 or more Psychic Powers, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Kingslayer
descrip: Score D3 Victory Points at the end of your turn if your opponent's Warlord has been removed as a casualty during this, or any previous turn.

name: Witch Hunter
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point at the end of your turn if at least one enemy unit with the Psyker, Psychic Pilot or Brotherhood of Psykers/Sorcerors special rule was completely destroyed during your turn.

name: Scour the Skies
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point at the end of your turn if at least one enemy Flyer or Flying Monstrous Creature was removed as a casualty during your turn.

name: Assassinate
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point at the end of your turn if at least one enemy character was removed as a casualty during your turn. If 3 or more enemy characters were removed as casualties during your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Demolitions
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point at the end of your turn if at least one gun emplacement or enemy building was destroyed during your turn. If at least one enemy building with the Mighty Bulwark special rule was destroyed during your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.

name: Big Game Hunter
descrip: Score 1 Victory Point at the end of your turn if at least one enemy Vehicle or Monstrous Creature was destroyed during your turn. If at least one enemy Super-heavy vehicle or Gargantuan Creature was destroyed during your turn, score D3 Victory Points instead.
